I've got it. We'll play around with the story alittle. It all happened 
on Cybertropolis, a moon of Cybertron. A clone of Megatron was 
planning to take over the rest of the planet. Offically everyone there 
died from the virus. Really, Cheetor inherited the ability to reformat 
(along with leadership), but after reimboding and reformating all the 
sparks they were abducted and are undergoing tests to get them out of 
their "inferior" state. Most of they tests revolve around the key to 
Vector Sigma so many are dieing. The Malacons evolved from a few 
escapees. CAN YOU DEAL WITH THAT EDITED PLOT!!!!?
